mapper.select: select * from TBL_ADMINS where UID = #{UID} and PSWD = #{PSWD}
select * from TBL_CENTERS where CENTER_UID = #{UID} and CENTER_PSWD = #{PSWD}
select CENTER_ID from TBL_CENTERS where CENTER_UID = #{UID} and CENTER_PSWD = #{PSWD}
mapper.update: update TBL_ADMINS set LAST_LGN_DT= #{LAST_LGN_DT} where UID = #{UID}
update TBL_ADMINS set USE_DT= #{USE_DT} where UID = #{UID}
